column1: Uchi////Since it was our first visit to Uchi
column4: for two people. We had three guidelines: 1) we wanted to have some salmon 2) we wanted to try the much talked about brussel sprouts 3) we were hungry! Our server was able to plot out a progression of dishes that we were very pleased with and the excitement of figuring out what would be next was also very fun. Some of the highlights included: the machi cure (sort of like "nachos" with yuka crisps
column11: those brussel sprouts were fantastic. The dessert was amazing as well - cantaloupe sherbet
